COMPRISING PIPING MODIFICATION KIT FOR COMBINING THE PRIMARY AND CENTRAL FUEL LINES AND BLANKING OFF THE TORCH AND OTHER SPLIT SECONDARY LINE- BLANKING PLUGS FOR THE LIQUID FUEL PORTS OF THE D/F ENGINES- PROVIDE A STANDBY APPLICATION SOFTWARE FOR FUEL CONTROL AND ALSO SOME SEQUENCING CHANGES TO MAKE IT SUITABLE FOR D/F ENGINE RUNNING IN DLE BERTH- THE BLEED DUCTING FOR DLE AND STANDARD NON-DLE (Y PIECE DUCTING FOR THE D/F TO CONNECT TO THE SAME PORTS ON THE PT HOOD AS THE DLE.)- DRAWING AND DOCUMENTATION TO REFLECT THE ABOVE CHANGES AND ALSO AN INSTALLATION GUIDE MANUAL
